item.name: Brini Estate Wines
item.address1: 698 Blewitt Springs Road, McLaren Vale, SA 5171 (postal)
item.description: The Brini family has been growing grapes in the Blewitt Springs area of McLaren Vale since 1953. In 2000 John and Marcello Brini established Brini Estate Wines to vinify a portion of the grape production; up to that time it had been sold to companies such as Penfolds, Rosemount Estate and dArenberg. The flagship Limited Release Shiraz is produced from dry-grown vines planted in 1947, the other wines from dry-grown vines planted in 64. Exports to the UK, Russia, Hong Kong and China.
